"Intel Pod":
"If you keep the PSE going, the photons around
you may eventually all activate at once, triggering
a powerful effect."

"This is called a PSE burst. For a set amount of
time your abilities are increased dramatically,
and you'll find a lot more items."

"PSEを持続させてると周囲のフォトンが
影響を受けて、一気に活性化。
すごい効果を発生させたりするよー。"

"これをPSEバーストって呼びますー。
一定時間の劇的な能力上昇、それに
アイテムもたーっくさん落ちるよー。"
